namuth the sadu bhajana soda thabima sidu nowi thibini.eyin pasu ema bhajana soda the wath kala ma ohu the sadimata paminena witada eewa esema thikhennata harina ladi.kisima dinakadi the sadimata ganna kisima upakaranayak ewelema soda thabana ma athin eya sidu wuye mandayi manawa therum gath wili ayiya pasuwa bhajana soda thabimada karana ladi.dahawal aahara ganimedi wenada men ohu aahara gena awasan wana thek bala sita bhajana sodanawa wenuwata purudu paridima ohuge bath patha kheda thaba an siyaluma bhajana soda damana ladi.handi maru wim gana paminili ethakin nima wiya..mese digata harahata wada katayuthu siddha wana wita ikhema wage damanaya wu wili ayiya ethek patan ma hata kisima wadak kimata nopamini athara..pasu kalinawa ma pawidi wu pasuwa ma kiwath nokiwath pansale siyaluma katayuthu soya bala siyathinma kala athara..kisida nokala iwum pihum wadada hari apuruwata karana ladi.ohuge dina chariyawe samahara dewal hamadamath eka lesama wu athara kisima witaka mawisin ee sambandhawa wachanayakudu nokiwe ohuge karadarayen midima wina an dewal walin mata kari nathi nisaya..pasu kalinawa ma pawidi wimata thiranaya kala bawa danagath pasu ma ha itha lengathuwa katayuthu kala ohu..ethan patan ma hata wishala shakthiyak wemin ma ha radi siti kalana mithuraku ha sama wiya.mohu sambandhawa thawath kiwa yuthu da bohoya..eewa mathak wana aakarayata idiriyedi kiyawenu atha.wisheshayenma dewiyan pilibandawa wu ohuge aakalpa pilibandawada wenama liwiya yuthuya.kese wethath ma wisin me liyanu labana athitha aawarjana thula mewan apurwa andame charitha boho thikhena athara pansal jiwithaya nam wu mema lipi pelehi pasuwa liwimata bala poroththuwana yam yam sidu wim wisthara kirimedi eewata nithara sambandha wana charitha pilibandawa mese liya thabima pasuwata pahasuwak wana nisama mese satahan kara sitina athara..
